name: Samsung Electronics Europe
goal:
Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. is an electronics and information technology company headquartered in Seoul, South Korea with sales networks and assembly plants in global sites across the world.

Samsung Electronics Europe is trading as Samsung Electronics (UK) Limited, a limited company registered in England and Wales, and its sole shareholder is Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. situated in South Korea.

The declaration in the transparency register is meant to reflect the public affairs activities of Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd. and its subsidiaries in the EU.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Intellectual Property
Copyright
Product Safety - Consumer Product Safety and Market Surveillance
Privacy - General Data Protection Regulation
Security - Network and Information Security Directive
Trade - EU Customs rules, TTIP
Tax - Corporate Tax, VAT
